name: The Majesty of Farmleigh House
description: Farmleigh sits on an estate of 78 acres situated north west of Dublins Phoenix Park,purchased from the world famous Guinness family by the irish Government in1999 for €29.2m.The house has been carefully refurbished by the Office of Public Works as the premier accommodation for visiting dignitaries and guests of the nation for high level Government meetings,and public enjoyment.
